title: *NEWLY RENOVATED BRIGHTON 1 BED- ONLY HALF BROKER FEE!*
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 79019250', 'Rent: $2,795 / Month', 'Beds: 1', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 09/01/2022', 'Rent Includes:: Heat, Hot Water', 'Parking:: street parking', 'Brighton 1 bedroom on Sutherland Road close to Boston College, Cleveland Circle, Brookline Border, T Access (B, C & D Lines) and MUCH MORE.', 'Unit features: hardwood floors, brand new kitchen w/ stainless steel appliances, spacious layout and laundry on site.', 'HEAT & HOT WATER INCLUDED.', 'ONLY HALF BROKER FEE!!', 'Call or email Jenna for more details', '978-504-1490', 'Transportation', 'Tram: B Sutherland Road (0.11 mi)', 'Bus: 86 Chestnut Hill Ave @ Englewood Ave (0.30 mi)', 'Bus: 501 Winship St @ Union St (0.47 mi)', 'Bus: Green Line D Shuttle Reservoir (0.36 mi)', 'Tram: C Englewood Avenue (0.25 mi)', 'Tram: D Reservoir (0.37 mi)', 'Bus: 65 Washington St @ Commonwealth Ave (0.35 mi)', 'FEATURES', 'Shopping Accessible', 'T Accessible', 'Jenna DeLuca of Benjamin Apartments & Cityside Homes', 'Real Estate Professional & Rental Manager', '978-504-1490', "Search Boston's largest selection of apartments at <URL>", 'Benjamin Apartments LLC makes a good faith effort to post accurate photographs and descriptions of the apartments listed for rent, but because the information is supplied by third parties and is not independently verified, we cannot always guarantee its accuracy.', 'Rental rates, listing information and availability are subject to error and change, and listed rates may be lower than actual rates due to incentives offered by landlords.', 'All apartments have a one month brokerage fee to be paid by renter unless otherwise noted.', 'Additionally, the apartment advertised may no longer be available for rent.', 'Benjamin Apartments LLC fully supports the principles of the Fair Housing Act and the Equal Opportunity Act.']
